description:
Graphs are the ultimate way of expressing statistical information , used in different fields like Infographics , Presentations , Marketing , Research , Statistics , and many more .

Graphs may look complex and hard to create and deal with , but they really are not . In this course , I'm going to teach you how to create and customize different types of graphs In Adobe Illustrator CC .

You : " But what if I don't know anything about using Illustrator ? " .

Me : Well , no worries ! I'm going to quickly teach you the basics of Illustrator that you will need in this course , then move on to creating and customizing graphs .

After the basics , you will learn the following :

  • How To Create A Graph
  • How To Resize And Rotate A Graph
  • How To Color The Portions Of A Graph
  • How To Add Percentage Text To A Graph
  • How To Create Different Types Of Graphs
Join This Course Now ! You Will Be Creating Your Own Graphs Like A Pro In No Time !Happy Learning
title: Create Graphs & Charts Easily In Adobe Illustrator
